A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was very good\, very entertaining. I’m not sure I understand all the complaining about the subplots and how the stories of some of the characters ended up\, or how certain bits of information weren’t revealed in a manner that was pleasing to some. Honestly it seems like a lot of the negative reviews are from people who didn’t get their way. This is what happens when you give out participation trophies. Don’t listen to them\, go see it. Aside from a couple scenes that were a bit cheesy\, as a whole it is really fun to watch.
